attributes.action: david cameron to fight with nogel farage in a boxing match
attributes.additional_details:
David cameron finds it acceptable gor the uk's soldiers to risk tgeir lives for wars that maybe in our interest but are not necessarily requiring our involvement, but when the live tv debate happens he hides away. A boxing match wpuld show a better character and put david cameron in the fighting spirit.

A 12 round match should be set up live and the earning back to the tax payer.
